## 🙋‍♂️ About Me

- 🔭 I’m currently working on **[Mistri Solutions](https://www.mistrisolutions.com/)**

- 🌱 I’m currently learning **Nodejs.**

- 👯 I’m looking to collaborate on **OpenSource Projects**

- 👨‍💻 I am working on my portfolio website(To be Continued) **

- 📫 How to reach me **rafidahsanofficial@gmail.com**

- ⚡ Fun fact **I am a musician and love to play game.**
